<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>dropdown_1/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
var arr = [];

for(var i = 0; i<api.state.tab3verticalAShowBreakdown.length; i++)
{
var myObj = {};
  myObj.id = api.data.look_up_records_1.results[i].sys_id.value;
myObj.label = api.data.look_up_records_1.results[i].name.value;

arr.push(myObj);

}
return arr;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-20 16:57:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>135291e41b5b3150dba1c3e5464bcb5a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dropdown_1/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_135291e41b5b3150dba1c3e5464bcb5a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-20 16:57:25</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
